__inputs.name: DS_LOKI
__inputs.label: Loki
__inputs.description: Loki datasource for Cloudflare Logpush data

description: Cloudflare Logpush analytics - HTTP requests, firewall events, Workers trace events, SOC/security, performance

panels.title: Requests

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__range]))

panels.description: Total HTTP requests across all zones over the selected time range.

panels.title: Error Rate % (5xx)

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeResponseStatus, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | EdgeResponseStatus >= 500 [$__range])) / sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__range])) * 100

panels.description: Percentage of requests returning 5xx status codes (server errors) over the selected time range.

panels.title: Cache Hit Ratio %

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheCacheStatus, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | CacheCacheStatus = `hit` [$__range])) / sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheCacheStatus, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | CacheCacheStatus != `` [$__range])) * 100

panels.description: Ratio of cache hits to all cacheable requests over the selected time range. Higher is better.

panels.title: Firewall Events

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__range]))

panels.description: Total firewall events (blocks, challenges, logs) across all zones over the selected time range.

panels.title: Leaked Credentials

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, LeakedCredentialCheckResult, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | LeakedCredentialCheckResult != `` | LeakedCredentialCheckResult != `clean` [$__range]))

panels.description: Requests where Cloudflare detected leaked credentials (username/password) over the selected time range. Excludes 'clean' results.

panels.title: High Risk WAF (score<20)

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, WAFAttackScore, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | WAFAttackScore > 0 | WAFAttackScore <= 20 [$__range]))

panels.description: Requests with WAF attack score 1-20 (high risk of being an attack: SQLi, XSS, or RCE) over the selected time range.

panels.title: Bot Traffic % (score<30)

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json BotScore, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | BotScore > 0 | BotScore < 30 [$__range])) / sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json BotScore, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | BotScore > 0 [$__range])) * 100

panels.description: Percentage of traffic classified as likely bot (BotScore 1-29) by Cloudflare Bot Management over the selected time range.

panels.title: Worker Errors

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="workers_trace_events"} | json Outcome | Outcome != `ok` [$__range]))

panels.description: Workers execution failures (exceptions, CPU exceeded, memory exceeded) over the selected time range.

panels.title: Requests by Host

targets.expr: sum by (ClientRequestHost) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__auto]))

panels.description: Request volume broken down by zone/hostname.

panels.title: Edge Response Status Codes

targets.expr: sum by (EdgeResponseStatus) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeResponseStatus, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__auto]))

panels.description: HTTP response status codes returned by the Cloudflare edge to the client. Color-coded: 2xx=green, 3xx=blue, 4xx=orange, 5xx=red.

panels.title: Requests by Method

targets.expr: sum by (ClientRequestMethod) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestMethod, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__auto]))

panels.description: Distribution of HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.).

panels.title: Requests by Protocol

targets.expr: sum by (ClientRequestProtocol) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientRequestProtocol, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__auto]))

panels.description: HTTP protocol version distribution (HTTP/1.1, HTTP/2, HTTP/3).

panels.title: Request Source (Eyeball vs Worker)

targets.expr: sum by (ClientRequestSource) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientRequestSource, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__auto]))

panels.description: Whether the request came from an end user (eyeball) or a Cloudflare Worker subrequest.

panels.title: Top Paths

targets.expr: approx_topk(20, sum by (ClientRequestPath) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__range])))

panels.description: Most requested URL paths. Uses approx_topk for probabilistic top-k over high-cardinality path data.

panels.title: Top User Agents (Bot score < 30)

targets.expr: approx_topk(20, sum by (ClientRequestUserAgent) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json BotScore, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientRequestUserAgent, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | BotScore > 0 | BotScore < 30 [$__range])))

panels.description: Most common User-Agent strings among requests classified as likely bots (BotScore 1-29).

panels.title: Top Error Paths (4xx+5xx)

targets.expr: approx_topk(20, sum by (ClientRequestPath) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeResponseStatus, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | EdgeResponseStatus >= 400 [$__range])))

panels.description: URL paths generating the most 4xx and 5xx errors. Useful for identifying broken endpoints or targeted attack paths.

panels.title: Edge Pathing (request handling decisions)

targets.expr: sum by (EdgePathingSrc, EdgePathingOp) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgePathingOp, EdgePathingSrc, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | EdgePathingOp != `wl` [$__auto]))

panels.description: How Cloudflare decided to handle each request. src=decision source (user/macro/filter), op=action taken (ban/chl/wl). Allowlisted (wl) requests are excluded.

panels.title: HTTP vs HTTPS

targets.expr: sum by (ClientRequestScheme) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientRequestScheme, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__auto]))

panels.description: Client request scheme distribution. HTTP traffic (red) may indicate misconfigured clients or lack of HTTPS redirect.

panels.title: Requests by Country (Map)

targets.expr: sum by (ClientCountry) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__range]))

panels.description: World map showing request volume by client country (ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2). Bubble size = request count.

properties.value: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

panels.title: Requests by Country (Top 10)

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (ClientCountry) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__auto])))

panels.description: Top 10 countries by request volume over time. Country codes are resolved to full names.

panels.title: Requests by Edge Colo (Top 10)

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (EdgeColoCode) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__auto])))

panels.description: Top 10 Cloudflare edge data centers (colos) serving requests. IATA airport codes (e.g., SIN=Singapore, NRT=Tokyo).

panels.title: Top Client ASNs

targets.expr: topk(25, sum by (ClientASN) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__range])))

topk(1, sum by (ClientASN, ClientASNDescription) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientASN, ClientASNDescription, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__range])))

panels.description: Top 25 Autonomous System Numbers by request count. ASN names resolved live from firewall_events ClientASNDescription field, with static fallback.

panels.title: Client Device Type

targets.expr: sum by (ClientDeviceType) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientDeviceType, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | ClientDeviceType != `` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Device type classification (desktop, mobile, tablet) based on User-Agent parsing.

panels.title: Top Referers

targets.expr: approx_topk(25, sum by (ClientRequestReferer) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientRequestReferer, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | ClientRequestReferer != `` [$__range])))

panels.description: Top referring URLs. Empty referers are excluded. Uses approx_topk for high-cardinality referer data.

panels.title: Client SSL Protocol

targets.expr: sum by (ClientSSLProtocol) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientSSLProtocol, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | ClientSSLProtocol != `` | ClientSSLProtocol != `none` [$__auto]))

panels.description: TLS protocol version used between client and Cloudflare edge (TLSv1.2, TLSv1.3).

panels.title: Client SSL Cipher

targets.expr: topk(15, sum by (ClientSSLCipher) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientSSLCipher, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | ClientSSLCipher != `` | ClientSSLCipher != `NONE` [$__auto])))

panels.description: TLS cipher suites negotiated between client and edge. Top 15 by request count.

panels.title: Origin SSL Protocol

targets.expr: sum by (OriginSSLProtocol) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, OriginSSLProtocol, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginSSLProtocol != `` | OriginSSLProtocol != `none` [$__auto]))

panels.description: TLS protocol version used between Cloudflare edge and origin server.

panels.title: mTLS Authentication Status

targets.expr: sum by (ClientMTLSAuthStatus) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientMTLSAuthStatus, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | ClientMTLSAuthStatus != `` | ClientMTLSAuthStatus != `unknown` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Mutual TLS client certificate validation results. 'ok'=valid cert, 'absent'=no cert presented, 'untrusted'/'expired'=invalid cert.

panels.title: Content Scan Results

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ContentScanObjResults, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | ContentScanObjResults != `` | ContentScanObjResults != `[]` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Cloudflare content scanning detections (malware, DLP) on request/response payloads.

panels.title: O2O (Orange-to-Orange) Traffic

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeCFConnectingO2O, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | EdgeCFConnectingO2O = `true` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Requests proxied through another Cloudflare zone before reaching this zone (orange-to-orange).

panels.title: Request Lifecycle Breakdown (avg ms)

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientTCPRTTMs, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap ClientTCPRTTMs [$__auto]))

sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientTCPRTTMs, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs < 65535 | label_format EdgeProcessingMs="{{ subf .EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs .OriginResponseDurationMs }}" | unwrap EdgeProcessingMs [$__auto]))

sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientTCPRTTMs, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginResponseDurationMs > 0 | unwrap OriginResponseDurationMs [$__auto]))

panels.description: Stacked breakdown of where request time is spent. Client→Edge = TCP RTT. Edge Processing = TTFB minus origin duration (WAF, bot checks, cache lookup), computed per-request via label_format. Excludes requests where EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs hit the uint16 cap (65535ms). Edge→Origin = origin fetch time (cache hits excluded).

panels.title: Edge TTFB — End to End (ms)

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.50, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.75, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.90, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.95, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.99, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs [$__auto]))

panels.description: End-to-end Time To First Byte: from after TCP handshake to first byte sent to the client. Includes TLS negotiation, WAF processing, cache lookup, and origin response time.

panels.title: Origin Response Duration (ms)

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginResponseDurationMs > 0 | unwrap OriginResponseDurationMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.50, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginResponseDurationMs > 0 | unwrap OriginResponseDurationMs [$__auto]))

panels.description: Total time for edge-to-origin request cycle: DNS resolution, TCP/TLS handshake, request send, and response receive. Includes Argo Smart Routing and Tiered Cache. Excludes cache hits (OriginResponseDurationMs=0).

panels.title: Client → Edge: TCP RTT (ms)

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientTCPRTTMs, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap ClientTCPRTTMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.50, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientTCPRTTMs, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap ClientTCPRTTMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.75, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientTCPRTTMs, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap ClientTCPRTTMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.90, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientTCPRTTMs, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap ClientTCPRTTMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.95, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientTCPRTTMs, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap ClientTCPRTTMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.99, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientTCPRTTMs, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap ClientTCPRTTMs [$__auto]))

panels.description: TCP round-trip time between the client and Cloudflare edge. Reflects geographic distance and network quality. Not affected by server-side processing.

panels.title: Edge Processing Time (ms)

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs < 65535 | label_format EdgeProcessingMs="{{ subf .EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs .OriginResponseDurationMs }}" | unwrap EdgeProcessingMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.50, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs < 65535 | label_format EdgeProcessingMs="{{ subf .EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs .OriginResponseDurationMs }}" | unwrap EdgeProcessingMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.75, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs < 65535 | label_format EdgeProcessingMs="{{ subf .EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs .OriginResponseDurationMs }}" | unwrap EdgeProcessingMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.90, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs < 65535 | label_format EdgeProcessingMs="{{ subf .EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs .OriginResponseDurationMs }}" | unwrap EdgeProcessingMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.95, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs < 65535 | label_format EdgeProcessingMs="{{ subf .EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs .OriginResponseDurationMs }}" | unwrap EdgeProcessingMs [$__auto]))

sum(quantile_over_time(0.99, {job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs < 65535 | label_format EdgeProcessingMs="{{ subf .EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs .OriginResponseDurationMs }}" | unwrap EdgeProcessingMs [$__auto]))

panels.description: Per-request edge processing time: EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs minus OriginResponseDurationMs, computed per log line via label_format. Excludes requests where TTFB hit the uint16 cap (65535ms). Represents time spent on WAF rules, bot detection, cache lookup, and request routing at the edge.

panels.title: Edge → Origin Timing Breakdown (avg ms)

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, OriginDNSResponseTimeMs, OriginRequestHeaderSendDurationMs, OriginResponseDurationMs, OriginResponseHeaderReceiveDurationMs, OriginTCPHandshakeDurationMs, OriginTLSHandshakeDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginResponseDurationMs > 0 | unwrap OriginDNSResponseTimeMs [$__auto]))

sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, OriginDNSResponseTimeMs, OriginRequestHeaderSendDurationMs, OriginResponseDurationMs, OriginResponseHeaderReceiveDurationMs, OriginTCPHandshakeDurationMs, OriginTLSHandshakeDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginResponseDurationMs > 0 | unwrap OriginTCPHandshakeDurationMs [$__auto]))

sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, OriginDNSResponseTimeMs, OriginRequestHeaderSendDurationMs, OriginResponseDurationMs, OriginResponseHeaderReceiveDurationMs, OriginTCPHandshakeDurationMs, OriginTLSHandshakeDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginResponseDurationMs > 0 | unwrap OriginTLSHandshakeDurationMs [$__auto]))

sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, OriginDNSResponseTimeMs, OriginRequestHeaderSendDurationMs, OriginResponseDurationMs, OriginResponseHeaderReceiveDurationMs, OriginTCPHandshakeDurationMs, OriginTLSHandshakeDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginResponseDurationMs > 0 | unwrap OriginRequestHeaderSendDurationMs [$__auto]))

sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, OriginDNSResponseTimeMs, OriginRequestHeaderSendDurationMs, OriginResponseDurationMs, OriginResponseHeaderReceiveDurationMs, OriginTCPHandshakeDurationMs, OriginTLSHandshakeDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginResponseDurationMs > 0 | unwrap OriginResponseHeaderReceiveDurationMs [$__auto]))

panels.description: Stacked sub-components of edge-to-origin time: DNS resolution, TCP handshake, TLS handshake, request header send, and response header receive. Excludes cache hits (OriginResponseDurationMs=0).

panels.title: Edge → Origin by Host (avg ms)

targets.expr: avg by (ClientRequestHost) (avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginResponseDurationMs > 0 | unwrap OriginResponseDurationMs [$__auto]))

panels.description: Average origin response duration per zone (cache hits excluded). Helps identify which hosts have slow origin servers.

panels.title: Edge TTFB by Host (avg ms)

targets.expr: avg by (ClientRequestHost) (avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs [$__auto]))

panels.description: Average end-to-end TTFB per zone. Compare with origin duration to see how much time is edge overhead vs origin.

panels.title: Client → Edge RTT by Host (avg ms)

targets.expr: avg by (ClientRequestHost) (avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientTCPRTTMs, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap ClientTCPRTTMs [$__auto]))

panels.description: Average client TCP RTT per zone. Reflects the geographic distribution of each zone's audience.

panels.title: Edge TTFB by ASN (avg ms, Top 10)

targets.expr: topk(10, avg by (ClientASN) (avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap EdgeTimeToFirstByteMs [$__auto])))

panels.description: Average TTFB for the top 10 ASNs by latency. Identifies networks with consistently slow end-to-end performance.

panels.title: Origin Response by Client ASN (avg ms, Top 10)

targets.expr: topk(10, avg by (ClientASN) (avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, OriginResponseDurationMs, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginResponseDurationMs > 0 | unwrap OriginResponseDurationMs [$__auto])))

panels.description: Average origin response duration grouped by the requesting client's ASN (cache hits excluded). No OriginASN field exists in Cloudflare Logpush. High values for specific ASNs may indicate those networks generate more cache misses or request heavier endpoints.

panels.title: Origin Error Rate by IP (5xx)

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (OriginIP) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, OriginIP, OriginResponseStatus, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginResponseStatus >= 500 [$__range])))

panels.description: Origin server IPs returning the most 5xx errors. Helps identify unhealthy origin instances.

panels.title: Edge → Origin Status Pairs

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (EdgeResponseStatus, OriginResponseStatus) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeResponseStatus, JA4, OriginResponseStatus, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | OriginResponseStatus > 0 [$__auto])))

panels.description: Edge vs origin status code pairs for origin-fetched requests. Matching pairs (200→200) are normal. Mismatches reveal edge transformations: 200→500 = stale cache served despite origin error, 403→200 = WAF blocked what origin allowed, 520→502 = Cloudflare converted origin error.

panels.title: Performance
panels.description: Request lifecycle timing: client-edge RTT, edge processing (WAF/cache), and edge-origin latency.

panels.title: Cache Status Over Time

targets.expr: sum by (CacheCacheStatus) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheCacheStatus, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | CacheCacheStatus != `` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Cache status distribution over time: hit, miss, dynamic (uncacheable), expired, revalidated, etc.

panels.title: Cache Status Distribution

targets.expr: sum by (CacheCacheStatus) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheCacheStatus, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | CacheCacheStatus != `` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Overall cache status proportions. 'dynamic' = not eligible for caching. 'hit' = served from cache.

panels.title: Cache Hit Ratio Over Time

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheCacheStatus, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | CacheCacheStatus = `hit` [$__auto])) / sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheCacheStatus, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | CacheCacheStatus != `` [$__auto])) * 100

panels.description: Cache hit ratio (%) over time. Only includes cacheable requests (excludes empty cache status).

panels.title: Cache Hit Ratio by Host (%)

targets.expr: sum by (ClientRequestHost) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheCacheStatus, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | CacheCacheStatus = `hit` [$__auto])) / sum by (ClientRequestHost) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheCacheStatus, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | CacheCacheStatus != `` [$__auto])) * 100

panels.description: Cache hit ratio per zone. Helps identify which zones benefit most from caching.

panels.title: Cache Hit Ratio by Path (Top 10, %)

targets.expr: approx_topk(10, sum by (ClientRequestPath) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheCacheStatus, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | CacheCacheStatus = `hit` [$__range])) / sum by (ClientRequestPath) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheCacheStatus, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | CacheCacheStatus != `` [$__range])) * 100)

panels.description: Cache hit ratio for the top 10 paths by cacheability (instant query over selected range). Uses approx_topk to avoid high-cardinality series explosion.

panels.title: Tiered Cache Fill Rate

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheTieredFill, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | CacheTieredFill = `true` [$__auto]))

sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheReserveUsed, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | CacheReserveUsed = `true` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Requests served via Tiered Cache (upper-tier colo) or Cache Reserve (persistent storage).

panels.title: Edge Response Bytes

targets.expr: sum(sum_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeResponseBytes, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap EdgeResponseBytes [$__auto]))

panels.description: Total bytes sent from edge to clients over time.

panels.title: Cache Response Bytes

targets.expr: sum(sum_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json CacheResponseBytes, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap CacheResponseBytes [$__auto]))

panels.description: Bytes served from cache over time. Compare with edge response bytes to see bandwidth savings.

panels.title: Content Type Distribution

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (EdgeResponseContentType) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeResponseContentType, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | EdgeResponseContentType != `` [$__auto])))

panels.description: Top 10 response content types (text/html, image/png, application/json, etc.).

panels.title: Compression Ratio (avg)

targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, EdgeResponseCompressionRatio, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | unwrap EdgeResponseCompressionRatio [$__auto]))

panels.description: Average compression ratio of edge responses. Higher = more compression. 1.0 = no compression.

panels.title: Smart Route / Argo Usage

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, SmartRouteColoID, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | SmartRouteColoID > 0 [$__auto]))

sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, SmartRouteColoID, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | SmartRouteColoID = 0 [$__auto]))

panels.description: Requests routed via Argo Smart Routing (optimized path) vs direct edge-to-origin. SmartRouteColoID > 0 indicates smart routing.

panels.title: Firewall Events by Action

targets.expr: sum by (Action) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json Action, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__auto]))

panels.description: Firewall events grouped by action taken: block, challenge, managedchallenge, jschallenge, log, skip, bypass, allow.

panels.title: Firewall Events by Source

targets.expr: sum by (Source) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, Source | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__auto]))

panels.description: Which Cloudflare security product triggered the firewall event (WAF, rate limiting, IP access rules, etc.).

panels.title: Top Firewall Client IPs

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (ClientIP) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__range])))

panels.description: Client IPs triggering the most firewall events. Candidates for IP access rules.

panels.title: Top Firewall Rules

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (RuleID, Description) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, Description, RuleID | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__range])))

panels.description: Most-triggered firewall rules by event count. Review rules with high 'log' counts for potential escalation to 'block'.

panels.title: Firewall Events by Host

targets.expr: sum by (ClientRequestHost) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__auto]))

panels.description: Firewall event distribution across zones. Identifies which hosts are most targeted.

panels.title: Firewall Events by Country (Map)

targets.expr: sum by (ClientCountry) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__range]))

panels.description: Geographic distribution of firewall events. Highlights countries generating the most blocked/challenged requests.

properties.value: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

panels.title: Firewall Events by Country (Top 10)

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (ClientCountry) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__auto])))

panels.description: Top 10 countries by firewall event volume over time.

panels.title: Top Attacked Paths

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (ClientRequestPath) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__range])))

panels.description: URL paths triggering the most firewall events. Identifies commonly targeted endpoints (login, admin, API routes).

panels.title: Top Attacking User Agents

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (UserAgent) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, UserAgent | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | UserAgent != `` [$__range])))

panels.description: User-Agent strings triggering the most firewall events. Common attack tools use distinctive UA strings.

panels.title: Top Attacking ASNs

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (ClientASN, ClientASNDescription) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientASN, ClientASNDescription, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__range])))

panels.description: Autonomous System Numbers generating the most firewall events. ASN names resolved live from Cloudflare ClientASNDescription field.

panels.title: Firewall Events by HTTP Method

targets.expr: sum by (ClientRequestMethod) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestMethod | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__auto]))

panels.description: HTTP methods in firewall events. POST/PUT heavy = credential stuffing or injection attacks. Unusual methods (OPTIONS, TRACE) may indicate reconnaissance.

panels.title: Challenge Solve Rate

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json Action, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | Action =~ "managedchallenge|challenge|jschallenge" [$__auto]))

sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, SecurityAction, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | SecurityAction =~ "managed_challenge|challenge|js_challenge" [$__auto]))

panels.description: Volume of challenge actions issued over time. Compare firewall_events challenges vs http_requests challenges to understand solve/fail rates.

panels.title: Firewall Action Distribution

targets.expr: sum by (Action) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json Action, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__range]))

panels.description: Overall distribution of firewall actions. Review 'log' proportion — high log-only rates may indicate rules that should be escalated.

panels.title: Rate Limiting Events

targets.expr: sum by (Action) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json Action, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, Source | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | Source = `ratelimit` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Firewall events from rate limiting rules, grouped by action. Source=ratelimit in firewall_events.

panels.title: L7 DDoS Mitigations

targets.expr: sum by (Action) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json Action, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, Source | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | Source = `l7ddos` [$__auto]))

panels.description: L7 DDoS protection events. Cloudflare automatically detects and mitigates application-layer DDoS attacks. Source=l7ddos in firewall_events.

panels.title: API Shield Events

targets.expr: sum by (Source) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, Source | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | Source =~ "apishield.*" [$__auto]))

panels.description: API Shield events including schema validation, JWT token validation, and sequence mitigation. Covers all apishield* sources.

panels.title: Bot Management Events

targets.expr: sum by (Action) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json Action, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, Source | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | Source =~ "botfight|botmanagement" [$__auto]))

panels.description: Bot Fight Mode and Bot Management firewall events. These are separate from the BotScore analysis — this shows enforcement actions.

panels.title: Rate Limited Paths

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (ClientRequestPath) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, Source | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | Source = `ratelimit` [$__range])))

panels.description: URL paths most frequently hit by rate limiting rules. Review for false positives on legitimate high-traffic endpoints.

panels.title: Rate Limited IPs

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (ClientIP) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, Source | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | Source = `ratelimit` [$__range])))

panels.description: Client IPs most frequently rate limited. Persistent offenders are candidates for IP block rules.

panels.title: Security Product Coverage

targets.expr: sum by (Source) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, Source | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" [$__auto]))

panels.description: All firewall events by security product source. Shows which Cloudflare security products are actively triggering. Full list: waf, firewallManaged, firewallCustom, ratelimit, l7ddos, botFight, ip, country, etc.

panels.title: WAF Rule Types (Managed vs Custom)

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, Source | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | Source = `waf` [$__auto]))

sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, Source | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | Source = `firewallmanaged` [$__auto]))

sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, Source | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | Source = `firewallcustom` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Comparison of WAF event sources: legacy WAF rules, managed rulesets (OWASP/Cloudflare), and custom WAF rules.

panels.title: IP/Country/ASN Access Rules

targets.expr: sum by (Source) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, Source | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | Source =~ "ip|iprange|asn|country|zonelockdown|uablock" [$__auto]))

panels.description: Access control rule events: IP access rules, IP range, ASN rules, country blocks, zone lockdown, and UA blocking.

panels.title: API & Rate Limiting
panels.description: Rate limiting, L7 DDoS, API Shield, and other product-specific firewall events. Uses the firewall_events Source field to filter by security product.

panels.title: WAF Attack Score Buckets

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, WAFAttackScore, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | WAFAttackScore > 0 | WAFAttackScore <= 20 [$__auto]))

sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, WAFAttackScore, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | WAFAttackScore > 20 | WAFAttackScore <= 50 [$__auto]))

sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, WAFAttackScore, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | WAFAttackScore > 50 [$__auto]))

panels.description: Cloudflare WAF attack score distribution. Score 1-20 = high confidence attack. Score 51+ = likely legitimate. Score 0 = not evaluated.

panels.title: Attack Type Breakdown (score <= 20)

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, WAFSQLiAttackScore, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | WAFSQLiAttackScore > 0 | WAFSQLiAttackScore <= 20 [$__auto]))

sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, WAFXSSAttackScore, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | WAFXSSAttackScore > 0 | WAFXSSAttackScore <= 20 [$__auto]))

sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, WAFRCEAttackScore, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | WAFRCEAttackScore > 0 | WAFRCEAttackScore <= 20 [$__auto]))

panels.description: High-risk attacks (score <= 20) broken down by type: SQL injection, cross-site scripting, remote code execution.

panels.title: Unmitigated Attacks (WAF score<=20, not blocked)

targets.expr: approx_topk(20, sum by (ClientRequestPath, ClientRequestHost) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, SecurityAction, WAFAttackScore, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | WAFAttackScore > 0 | WAFAttackScore <= 20 | SecurityAction = `` [$__range])))

panels.description: GAP ANALYSIS: High-risk attack traffic (WAF score 1-20) that was NOT blocked or challenged. Empty SecurityAction = no mitigation applied. Review these paths for WAF rule gaps.

panels.title: Security Rule Efficacy

targets.expr: topk(30, sum by (SecurityRuleID, SecurityRuleDescription, SecurityAction) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, SecurityAction, SecurityRuleDescription, SecurityRuleID, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | SecurityRuleID != `` [$__range])))

panels.description: All triggered security rules with their action. Review 'log' actions for rules that should be escalated to 'block'.

panels.title: Security Actions on HTTP Requests

targets.expr: sum by (SecurityAction) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, SecurityAction, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | SecurityAction != `` [$__auto]))

panels.description: All security actions applied to HTTP requests over time. Sourced from the http_requests dataset SecurityAction field (uses underscored values: block, managed_challenge, js_challenge, challenge).

panels.title: Client IP Classification

targets.expr: sum by (ClientIPClass) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientIPClass, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | ClientIPClass != `noRecord` | ClientIPClass != `` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Cloudflare IP threat intelligence classification. badHost = known malicious, scan = scanner, tor = Tor exit node, searchEngine = legitimate crawler.

panels.title: Leaked Credential Check Results

targets.expr: sum by (LeakedCredentialCheckResult) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, LeakedCredentialCheckResult, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | LeakedCredentialCheckResult != `` | LeakedCredentialCheckResult != `clean` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Cloudflare Leaked Credential Check results. Detects credentials found in known breach databases. MITRE ATT&CK T1110.004.

panels.title: Fraud Detection

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, FraudAttack, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | FraudAttack != `` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Cloudflare fraud detection signals on incoming requests.

panels.title: Top Talkers (by request count)

targets.expr: approx_topk(25, sum by (ClientIP) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" [$__range])))

panels.description: Top 25 client IPs by total request volume. High-volume IPs may be bots, scrapers, or DDoS sources.

panels.title: Suspicious UAs (BotScore < 30)

targets.expr: approx_topk(20, sum by (ClientRequestUserAgent) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json BotScore, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientRequestUserAgent, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | BotScore > 0 | BotScore < 30 [$__range])))

panels.description: User-Agent strings with low bot scores (1-29 = likely automated). Identify scraping tools, vulnerability scanners, and fake browsers.

panels.title: Fraud Detection Tags

targets.expr: sum by (FraudDetectionTags) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, FraudDetectionTags, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | FraudDetectionTags != `` | FraudDetectionTags != `[]` [$__auto]))

panels.description: Cloudflare Turnstile and fraud detection tag distribution over time. Tags identify categories of fraudulent behavior.

panels.title: Fraud Detection IDs

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (FraudDetectionIDs) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, FraudDetectionIDs, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | FraudDetectionIDs != `` | FraudDetectionIDs != `[]` [$__range])))

panels.description: Specific fraud detection rule IDs triggered. Each ID maps to a specific detection signal in Cloudflare's fraud detection system.

panels.title: Top Client Regions (subnational)

targets.expr: topk(25, sum by (ClientRegionCode) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRegionCode, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | ClientRegionCode != `` [$__range])))

panels.description: Top client regions (ISO 3166-2 subdivision codes, e.g., US-CA, GB-LND). Provides subnational geographic granularity beyond country level.

panels.title: Firewall Events: Top Request URIs

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (ClientRequestPath, ClientRequestQuery) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="firewall_events"} | json ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, ClientRequestQuery | ClientRequestHost =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | ClientRequestQuery != `` [$__range])))

targets.expr: approx_topk(20, sum by (ClientCountry, ClientRequestPath) (count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | ClientRequestPath =~ `.*(admin|login|wp-login|phpmyadmin|xmlrpc|eval|exec|api/auth).*` [$__range])))

panels.title: Bot Score Distribution

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json BotScore, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | BotScore > 0 | BotScore < 30 [$__auto]))

sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json BotScore, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | BotScore >= 30 | BotScore < 50 [$__auto]))

sum(count_over_time({job="cloudflare-logpush", dataset="http_requests"} | json BotScore, ClientASN, ClientCountry, ClientIP, ClientRequestHost, ClientRequestPath, EdgeColoCode, JA4, ZoneName | ZoneName =~ "$zone" | ClientRequestHost =~ "$host" | ClientCountry =~ "$country" | ClientRequestPath =~ "$path" | ClientIP =~ "$ip" | JA4 =~ "$ja4" | ClientASN =~ "$asn" | EdgeColoCode =~ "$colo" | BotScore >= 50 [$__auto]))
